column2: we had the malted whiskey sundae
column3: with hot fudge on the side. The malted whiskey ice cream tasted like a hybrid of butter scotch and caramel
column4: unique and YUMMY. Â Our bill came at around $180
column6: it's on the higher bound. BUT we did both get couple of drinks (count in my husband's jameson shot)
column8: so personally i think it's reasonable.
